maya/scripts/AEbeastSettingsTemplate.py
# Copyright 2013 Autodesk, Inc.  All rights reserved.
# Use of this software is subject to the terms of the Autodesk license agreement
# provided at the time of installation or download, or which otherwise 
# accompanies this software in either electronic or hard copy form.

import pymel.core
import pymel.core.general
import beastUtils

class AEbeastSettingsTemplate(pymel.core.ui.AETemplate):
        def __init__(self, nodeName):
                self.beginScrollLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Render Settings", collapse = 0)
                self.callCustom(self.createConfigFileSelector, self.createConfigFileSelector, "configXml")
                self.addControl("distribution", label="Enable Distribution")
                self.addControl("renderQuality", label="Render Quality")
                self.addControl("causticsMode", label="Caustics Mode")
                self.addControl("maxRayDepth", label="Max Ray Depth")
                self.addControl("motionBlur", label="Motion Blur")
                self.addControl("motionSteps", label="Motion Steps")
                self.beginLayout("Live Settings", collapse = 0)
                self.addControl("liveViewRes", label="Live View")
                self.addControl("liveNoiseReduction", label="Bake Noise Reduction")
                self.addSeparator()
                self.addControl("directScale", label="Direct Scale")
                self.addControl("indirectScale", label="Indirect Scale")
                self.addControl("diffuseBoost", label="Diffuse Boost")
                self.addControl("emissiveScale", label="Emissive Scale")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Bake Settings", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("selectionBake", label="Bake Selection")
                self.addControl("texelScale", label="Global Texel Scale")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Material Settings", collapse=0)
                self.beginNoOptimize();
                self.addControl("useTextureFile", label="Use file textures directly", changeCommand=self.onUseTextureFile)
                self.addControl("removeDuplicateTextures", label="Remove duplicate textures")
                self.endNoOptimize();
                self.addControl("maxShaderSamplingResolution", label="Max Shader Sampling Resolution")
                self.endLayout()
                self.endScrollLayout()
                self.suppress("caching")
                self.suppress("nodeState")

        def onUseTextureFile(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "removeDuplicateTextures", node.useTextureFile.get() is False)

        def createConfigFileSelector(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                node = attr.node()
                if hasattr(self, "configCtrl"):
                        pymel.core.windows.deleteUI(self.configCtrl)
                self.configCtrl = pymel.core.windows.textFieldButtonGrp(label="Config XML", buttonLabel="Browse", text=node.configXml.get(), editable=False, buttonCommand=pymel.core.windows.Callback(self.onPressConfigSelect, node))

        def onPressConfigSelect(self, node):
                filter = "Beast Config XML Files (*.xml)"
                templateDirectory = pymel.core.melGlobals['gBeastRoot'] + "/examples/data"
                configFile = pymel.core.system.fileDialog2(startingDirectory=templateDirectory, caption="Select Beast config file", fileFilter=filter, dialogStyle=2, fileMode=1)
                if configFile and len(configFile) > 0:
                        configFile = configFile[0]
                        node.configXml.set(configFile)
                        self.configCtrl.setText(configFile)
